text: Caldera is a corregimiento in Boquete District, Chiriquí Province, Panama. It has a land area of and had a population of 1,560 as of 2010, giving it a population density of . Its population as of 1990 was 1,175; its population as of 2000 was 1,204. ==References== Category:Corregimientos of Chiriquí Province
title: Caldera, Chiriquí
